name: Bella Sina Beach Lodge
location: Taba International Highway 23K El Homayra, Nuweiba 26007 Egypt
description: Bella Sina Is an Direct Beach Small Hotel An oasis in the desert, perfect for peace and quiet - ideal for nature lovers. We have direct access to the reef with its fantastic view of the multi colored underwater world. Snorkeling is one of the activities that even beginners can enjoy Our newly opened resort offers international and regional dishes. If you want absolute peace and quiet, just relax in our lobby. Perfect for groups of between 6 and 20 people. The resort is managed by an Egyptian/German team

name: Sina Star Camp
location: Nuweiba Street Next to Helnan Hotel, Nuweiba 14325 Egypt

name: Wishwashi Camp & Resort
location: Km 14, Nuweiba - Taba Road, Nuweiba 46621 Egypt

name: La Sirene Resort
location: El Corniche St. Mazeina, Nuweiba Egypt

name: Alwaha camp
description: Simplicity and culture done to Bedouin traditions Alwaha Camp is straightforward but has all basic amenities and with very affordable price. Located in the beach Ras Sheetan, this place offers magic landscape views, you will never forget. There are 22 Huts (bamboo huts) in the beach, all unique and self made. Each hut has super kingsize bed with mosquito nets, electricity, fan and all the basic needs provided, there are sharing unisex toilets and showers which are very closed to huts. Also all huts are in beachfront and having balconies with unlimited sea view. As also have 6 AC huts as there also 8 AC rooms with private bathroom and shower. Alwaha Camp offers traditional bedouin, vegetarian or halal food, breakfast and meals. All the staff very accommodating and friendly, also they speak English. Alwaha camp offer an array of activities such as a hiking in desert, boat fishing, camel rides and jeep safari tours. Alwaha Camp is well planned where you have an option to mingle with others or to have your own spot.

name: Feriencamp Meditation Village
location: Taba Nuweiba Street Meditation camp Ras shitan, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: Das Meditation Village ist ein Feriencamp in Nuweiba, Sinai, Ägypten.Hier können Sie Ferien machen, sich erholen, abschalten, Tauchen oder Schnorcheln.Das Camp verfügt über 24 komfortable und 8 A.C ROOM.

name: Sayadeen Village
location: Sayadeen Village Road El Mezina Bay, Nuweiba Egypt

name: RockSea
description: Imagine one of the most magnificent desert landscapes Mother Earth can offer, where sandy coloured mountains fall directly into the deep blue sea, where the warm winds caress soul and skin, where every evening the setting sun inflames a spectacular for the senses; this is the place where we offer you and us the biggest luxury one has to give: silence, simplicity and a life-time in front of the shimmering scenery of the elements.  Crashing of the waves beneath a panoply of stars.  Here, luxury has a different spelling.  The accommodation is equipped with everything essential for living. Not more. Comfortable beds, furniture made from palm branches, electricity for light.  Nothing disturbs the perception of the essential: starry sky, desert wind and the crashing of the sea.  Desert ships and coral reefs. When – if necessary at all – using the faux-pas word "active holidays," here it gets a different meaning: may it be simple (simply) relaxing in unspoiled nature, walking or jeep safaris, snorkeling, reef-diving, belly dancing or camel riding –  the German owners help their guests to obtain the well-being you have been dreaming of..... The healthy savoury cooking of the managing lady surely contributes to this. You will find 22 robust bungalows covered with straw, clean sanitary equipment and a characteristic wild private coral beach which nestle in the natural rock surroundings made only by the hands of God. This resort, under the management of German emigrates, appeals to (approaches) all travelers who simply want to fully enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the Sinai.  There is something that can easily be left behind: the word "duty." Arabian calmness (equanimity) rules the resort. Only one thing cannot be avoided: A laid-back chat with bedouines passing by, accompanied by a sweetened tea on a soft cushion in a tent.  The best period for visiting the RockSea resort runs from late summer to late middle European spring. Workshops (seminars) and experiences in the dome. A big tent in form of a dome offers rest and space for teams and groups who want to freshen (up) their stay through seminars (workshops) or other common experiences at the foot of the Sinai. Whether it be dance, yoga, lectures, meditation or role-playing – it is you who decides.  Simply speak to the management of the resort in time to make sure that the equipment and media meet your expectations.  The RockSea Resort at the foot of the Sinai – far away from the busy Egyptian spas  - represents on oasis for travelers who want to relax with all senses - away from the hustle of crowded pools and animations.  Here, close to Nuweiba, Ricarda, Roxy and Michael from Germany are living their dream and want to share it with their guests.

name: Sawa Camp
description: This is a beach camp. We have simple wooden huts on the beach. You will be provided with a mattress, and mosquito net. Blankets are available upon request.  We are located on the shores of the beautiful Red Sea. Access to the coral reefs is from in front of our  beach huts. We have snorkeling equipment for hire and we can organise scuba diving trips for you also. We organise day trips to St Katherine/ Mt Sinai,Dahab, Israel, Jordan and Desert safaris.We can organise pick ups from Sharm el Sheikh, Taba border, Nuweiba port and help with transport from anywhere in Egypt.

name: Bedouin Star Ras Shitan
location: Ras Shaitan Nuweiba Taba Road, Nuweiba Egypt
description: Ras Shitan camp Deluxe bungalow with Aircondition and private bathroom - Standard bungalow - Husha enjoy our swimming pool Welcome at Bedouin Star | ras shitan | Nuweiba ?????? Egypt

name: Swisscare Nuweiba Resort Hotel
description: Set on its own private sandy beach between the majestic mountains of Sinai and the sparkling clear coral-filled seas of the Gulf of Aqaba, the Swisscare Nuweiba Resort Hotel has been specifically designed for those guests seeking clean and comfortable accommodation with excellent food and drinks in an astoundingly beautiful, peaceful and relaxing environment.

name: Basata Eco Lodge
description: The first Ecolodge of its kind in Egypt. Established by Sherif El-Ghamrawy in 1986, Basata preserves in many different ways the environment and supports the local community. Its concept and design are reflected in its name that means simplicity in Arabic. The Lodge attempts to create a simple and unique form of tourism that has a relatively low impact on the surrounding environment and native inhabitants.

name: Misho Camp
location: Km 15 Road Nuweiba Taba International Next To The Sonesta Beach Resort Hotel Taba, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: misho and his extended family invite you to their tranquil beach side camp in southern sinai. with a backdrop of the soaring malha mountains, the red Sea and the ever changing vista of the mountains of saudi arabia, misho camp is a beautiful location for a unique holiday.

name: Bab Eldonia Camp
location: Kilo 25 Nuwieba Tabs road, Nuweiba 49925 Egypt

name: Ciao Nuweiba Hotel
location: Dune Beach Nuweiba Town, Nuweiba 12 Egypt
description: Ciao Nuweiba Hotel is situated on the Dunes Beach along the Red Sea, 3 kilometres south of Nuweiba town and 4 km north of Nuweiba Port. The hotel by its peculiar location offers a great site of the majestic mountains of Sinai, a direct access into a coral-filled area of the red sea, and a perfect place to enjoy sun baths on the soft sand dunes at the hotel's private beach. Elegantly furnished air conditioned rooms.

name: Dayra Camp
description: Dayra camp is home for responsible travelers & backpackers who seek inner peace, social interaction, those who are willing to help themselves with love. Rooms are straw huts and Egyptian cotton tents with shared toilets

name: Al Magarra Camp
location: Taba-Nuweba Road Next to La Playa Hotel Taba, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt

name: New Moon Island Camp
location: Nuweiba-Taba road Ras Shitan, Nuweiba Egypt
description: Location: From the finest spot of the Sinai Peninsula lies the idealistic "Moon Island", bringing you one of the most scenic, quiet and secluded beaches of Egypt to keep you relaxed and help you unwind Accommodation: 30 sea view bungalows giving the natural look that blends with the surrounding, making sure you would enjoy the best of camping in a comfortable and convenient ambiance. Restaurant: “Moon Island” offers a rich selection of local and international food. You can either enjoy your meal at your bungalow’s private patio or at our open-air restaurant. Share the banquet experience with your friends and loved ones amidst the enormous mountains and relaxing sea shore Attraction: Diving/ Snorkelling Hiking Safari trips Rooms & Facilities: Rooms are equipped with power outlets Rooms have private balconies with sea view Pick-up and transfer services Drinking ice cubes Heated showers Pet friendly.

name: Nakhil Inn
location: Jasmine street Tarabeen Bay, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: Staying in rooms right on the beach at the Red Sea , snorkeling at our beach , beautiful reef , Diving at Nuweiba diving sites , mountain trekking, jeep safaris to the national park of Abu Galoum and the blue lagouna , camel trips are all available with Nakhil Inn and Dream

name: Habiba Beach Lodge
location: Newabaa St Habiba Bay, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: Situated on a sandy beach overlooking Habiba Bay, this hotel features an open-air restaurant. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and air-conditioned rooms.Rooms at Habiba Village have simple furnishings and traditional décor. Each room has it's own private bathroom with a shower.Guests can relax on the beach and enjoy grilled seafood, and meals from our organic farm (fresh everyday) and views of the Red Sea. The indoor restaurant serves breakfast and European cuisine.Habiba Village is a 3-minute drive from the coastal town Nuweiba and is 64 km from Taba International Airport. Free private parking is possible on site. Leisure activities include camel rides, hiking, snorkeling, diving, mountain climbing and tours in a glass-bottom boat.

name: TIME Coral Nuweiba Resort
location: Nuweiba Street 1.40 Miles From Downtown, Nuweiba 46625 Egypt
description: Overlooking the beautiful Gulf of Aqaba, this 4-star resort features luscious gardens of flowers and palms and an extended private sandy beach on the Red Sea. The resort has 5 restaurants and 2 bars. It offers rooms with balconies or patios. Wired internet is available in all the rooms and has a beach volleyball of TIME Coral Nuweiba Resort. Guests can also relax in a hammock on the beach, or sunbathe by the pool. Risottos and fresh salads are served at the contemporary Blue Blue Restaurant. The beach bar offers ice-cold beers and ice cream under the shade of a palm-roofed hut. There is also a disco serving light snacks until midnight. And a kids playground to let the little angels have some fun in a safe environment.

name: Nuweiba Club Resort
location: Villages Road Gulf of Aqaba, Nuweiba 46625 Egypt
description: Nuweiba Club Resort is Located in the coastal town in the eastern part of Sinai Peninsula, Nuweiba Club Resort is uniquely positioned on the coast of the Gulf of Aqaba, offering unforgettable view of Aqaba Gulf and the Sinai Mountains. Just 75 km north of Dahab, the hotel is spread on a large piece of land, and is strategically located in close proximity to the Nuweiba Harbor, as well as being a ten-minute walk from the Tarabin Bedouin Village. The hotel is also situated 80 km from Taba Airport, a two-hour drive from the Sharm El Sheikh Airport, and just 60 km south of the Israel-Egypt border separating Taba and Eilat, making it accessible to tourists from all over the region.

name: Half Moon Camp
location: Taba-Nwueibaa Road, Beer Suer, K35 35, Nuweiba 46621 Egypt

name: Free Beach Camp
description: Free Beach Camp provides accommodations with a private beach area and free WiFi, and is located in Nuweiba`. Guests at the campground can enjoy a continental breakfast. Free Beach Camp has a sun terrace. Eilat is 48.3 km from the accommodation. This property also has one of the top-rated locations in Nuweiba‘ el Muzeinah! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area.

name: Rossa Beach Camp
description: Situated right on the shore of the Red Sea, Rossa Beach Camp offers an authentic, simple, non expensive way to spend your holiday all year around away from the crowd. Snorkel, scuba dive, kite surf, go for excursions or just relax. Rossa Beach Camp provides lodging literally on the beach in truly authentic Bedouin style, delicious fresh food and tidy shared bathrooms. Rossa Beach Camp is driven by Egyptian, Swedish and Italian people.

name: Jazzy Camp
location: Taba Nuweiba Road 5 km Before Nuweiba City, Nuweiba 12345 Egypt
description: Jazzy Camp is located in the heart of Sinai, It's a Bedouin Beach Camp and lodge. Helping you to bind with mother nature in an unforgettable way.

name: Barracuda Camp
description: Barracuda camp is set 5km outside Nuweiba, on the Taba Road, South Sinai. Situated directly on the beach, the small bungalows are built from wood and palm leaves which are positioned around the camp. The shower and toilet facilities are of very good standard. Barracuda camp consists of a very good restaurant which has an expansive menu from Egyptian food to English;(watch them make the Bedouin bread, have a go yourself, we will let you), also fresh fish can be served daily (mainly caught by the neighboring fisherman or even by the family or staff), anything that you require we will be only too pleased to try and accommodate. From the beach there are two reefs which are excellent for snorkeling, where you can see a variety of colourful fish and coral. If you feel a little nervous, no problems someone will snorkel with you. The camp is owned by a friendly family man, named Sulman who speaks very good English, also there is an English lady that is based at the camp who will be only too pleased to help with anything. Barracuda is a peaceful quiet camp ideal to relax in. The scenic view of the mountains behind and looking across the red sea is a beautiful site to take in.

name: Sinai Life Beach Camp
location: 11km Nuweiba - Taba Road Ras Shattan, Nuweiba Egypt

name: Bawaki Beach Camp
location: Km.18 North Of Nuweiba, Nuweiba Egypt

name: Utopia Camp
description: Straw huts by the beach (2 guests maximum), Cotton tents (2 guests maximum) and Concrete rooms (4 guests maximum)

name: Ananda Camp
location: Nueiba-Taba Road 22 Kms North Nueiba, Nuweiba Egypt

name: Makati Camp
location: South Sinai, Nuweiba Taba international road - Route 50M/Route 55M, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: Makati camp (soon to be MERAKI camp) is a beach camp on the coastline of Sinai, Egypt, with wooden huts to sleep in, just few meters from the sea. Life here is simple and very much in contact with nature. Warm yourself in the Sinai sun, looking out over the mountains, with your bare feet in the sand, taking refreshing dips in the sea, while breathing in the ocean air. Our camp is more a community than a tourist attraction, and what our guests tell us is that they feel immediately at home. The land is very powerful with strong healing energy, taking away from us all that we don’t need to carry anymore. Be welcome to stay with us a while to relax, connect and heal.

name: Fayrouz Beach Resort
location: Duna, Nuweiba Nuweiba, South Sinai, Egypt, Nuweiba Egypt
description: Fayrouz Beach Resort is between the port and the town of Nuweiba. It is in a quiet peaceful location with a large sandy beach and coral reef for snorkeling. Swimming is safe and boat trips are available. The rooms are en-suite with balconies, twin or double beds. There are also some economical beach huts for rent. The restaurant serves fresh fish, Egyptian & vegetarian dishes. Next door there is a Yoga Studio with a massage room. You can arrange classes and well-being treatments. The friendly staff at Fayrouz can arrange airport transfers and safaris by camel or jeep. Their moto is that if their guests are happy, they are happy.

name: Ayla Camp
description: Ayla Camp, an upscale beach camp set on the sandy beaches of South Sanai where we have strived to make our customers experience an unforgettable one. Our sandy beach and the unique setup of our Huts and tents with a breathtaking sea and Mountain View, in addition to the variety of amenities and up scaled quality of service all guarantee to make our customers stay unforgettable memory.

name: Aqua Sun Hotel
location: Km 35, Taba Nuweibaa Rd., Nuweiba Egypt
description: Facing the Red Sea with beautiful coral reefs, ringed by the red mountains. Surrounded by the peaceful serenity of the desert. AQUA SUN IS A STATE OF MIND

name: Starlight Camp
description: Starlight Camp Nuweiba is your second home. We offer two type of accommodation (Bungalow* AC & Khosha* Fan) as well Restaurant football playground & Volleyball Swings & Hammock Bedouin Seats Shared bathrooms Open kitchen & bar Snorkeling & Diving & Trips

name: Live the Bedouin Life
description: Livethebedouinlife Camp is completely self-sufficient, the electricity comes from solar panels and the water for the showers and toilets comes from a basin that is topped up from outside. The showers and toilets are shared. A warm solar shower is also available (to a limited extent). Everything is clean and well maintained. You are literally and figuratively “off the grid” here..! WiFi is available, that is, but also to a limited extent. Water shoes and snorkels are provided. There is a Sup-Board with which you can easily sup to the most beautiful pieces of coral without damaging the coral. Behind the camp is a "colored canyon" where you can take beautiful walks. All rooms are located directly on the beach and all have sea view. The rooms cost 300 Egyptian pounds (16.76 Euro) per night per person incl. breakfast. Trips such as watching the sunset from a mountain in the desert, Wishwash or other activities or overnight stays in the desert can be organized here on site. Transfer from and to the airport can be organized on request for an additional cost, depending on which airport needs to be picked up or dropped off.

name: Bakraj 3
description: Sheikh Ashish's Bakraj 3 (established in 1982) is a Bedouin eco-lodge located on the coast of the Gulf of Aqaba 5 km north of Nuweiba, South Sinai, Egypt. It is nestled between the majestic mountains of Sinai and the Red Sea, with spectacular views of Saudi Arabia. Visit the most hospitable site in South Sinai and experience culture and nature at their best. Beach hut accommodation - restaurant (seafood and local) - diving - fishing - safaris - outdoor adventures

name: Dana Beach Camp
location: Wadi El Mahash, Taba - Newiba Road, Nuweiba 46622 Egypt

name: Aquarium Camp
location: Taba Road Ca. 25km Von Nweiba Entfernt, Zwischen, Nuweiba 44618 Egypt

name: El Badawy Camp
description: Visit Paradise in the Holy Land of SinaiTranquility, gorgeous nature and simple living Life is beautiful - Especially in Nuweiba.- all just waiting for you!El Badawy Camp is all about good life, happy feelings and the perfect place for your next adventure!On our beach we have a beautiful recreational area with very cosy ambiance – lights on or off – depending if you are in the mood for star gazing or making fire at our fire place next to the Red Sea. If you would like to read a book or take a nap in our ham rock you are more than welcome.In our palm garden in the back you will find areas for dining, chatting, chilling or singing by the fire place.In the shade or under the sun we are sure you will find a place that pleases you in El Badawy Camp:)This year we introduce huts without roof – which makes it possible to go star gazing while having dinner or chilling in solitude or in private groups. We have one made especially for girls ”the girly hut” with pink couchins and decorations from the the Red Sea.So please come and join us in enjoing lifes more quiet aspects!

name: White Palace Hostel
location: El Shabab Street Tarabeen, Nuweiba 46618 Egypt

name: Regina Style Nuweibaa
location: 6 El Corniche Rd. Touristic Division Harbour, Nuweiba Egypt

name: Soft Beach Camp
LANGUAGES SPOKEN: English, Russian, Arabic, German and 1 more

name: Harby's Place
description: Harby's Place is a Bedouin owned and managed eco-lodge situated in the beautiful surroundings of Wadi Mahash on the shores of the Red sea, South Sinai, Egypt. Its remote location and authentic beach huts make it an unique destination for eco-tourism and peace-seeking visitors.At Harby's accommodation is a traditional Bedouin 'hoosha' - a straw beach hut / cabin,All of our beach huts are clean and comfortable, equiped with Bedouin carpets, mattresses, a small sitting area and a balcony covered with carpets to watch the sea and the sunrise. Each hut has its own hammock and we supply sheets and blankets (in winter).

name: Petra Camp
description: Petra Camp welcomes you!A pleasant stay in a pleasant atmosphere with excellent service and a central location in our region that offers petra camp. We look forward to welcoming you and invite you to get an overview of our offer.Petra Camp offers a variety of bedouin lounges right on the sea which makes it the ideal place to lounge, tan or relax after snorkeling in the variety of coral reefs just meters from the shore.Feel free with the teamWe make you feel home by preparing food for you from the culture itself that you will be happy and feel comfortable.Feel that you are in EgyptWe offer you for example a nice camel ride , even sometime there is somewhere a camel race which you can enjoy.

name: Eco Camp Asala Beach
description: Our Eco-Camp lies in a quiet location by the Red Sea, about 40 km north of Nuweiba, here you can really relax.We offer accommodation for different needs and price ranges and in our fish restaurant we serve fresh fish from the sea.Enjoy the sunsets with a walk along the white sandy beach.Our coral reef is the home to schools of colorful fish and other sea creatures. Marvel at the underwater world while snorkeling.From here you can also book various trips to other attractions in South Sinai, be it a camel ride or a jeep safari into the desert or a 2-day trip to St. Catherine's Monastery and climbing Moses Mountain at sunrise.

name: Sinai Life Beach Camp
location: 12 Km Nuweiba Taba Road, Nuweiba Egypt

name: La Commune - South Sinai
description: La Commune brings you a new taste of simplicity and perfection where you get to sit back, relax and enjoy the unique and natural scenery of Sinai. All the while, you get to meet different, as well as like-minded individuals, with unique ideas, skills, and thoughts. The mountains of Sinai are our backyard and the Red Sea is our front porch! Join us for an unforgettable Sinai experience :)

name: Haven Beach Camp
location: 10 km from Ticket office Nuweiba-Aqaba Ferry., Nuweiba 46618 Egypt
description: Haven Beach Camp is simply a beach camp where you can simply live the experiance of living in a Wooden Hut two steps from the sea, with a arabian bedouin atmosphere...

name: SinaiStars Bedouin Camp
description: These Bedouin Camps are a little paradise for people that love nature and the authentic Sinai. Singles are welcome, as well families and groups.Al Mahash is a wonderful beach between Taba and Nuweiba, the Bedouin Camps there are existing almost 20 years. Your home will be a cosy little hut directly on the beach.Toilets and showers are a 20 metres away in a big bathroom.The restaurant provides very tasty and healthy food, always fresh cooked.You can enjoy the ocean, corals and fishes or also make a trip to the desert and biblical places.We provide taxi transfer from the airport in Sharm el Sheikh. If you come from cairo, there is a daily bus to the Sinai.If you need help with searching your flight, we can help you here as well.

name: Amor Beach Camp
description: Amor beach camp is the best place to experience Sinai. The place provides Free parking and free WIFI, meals, beach access, taxies and guidance to all must-see sites on Sinai. There is nothing like waking up and see the sea in front of you.
